https://tmrev.io/movie/683819-Charlie and the Chocolate Factory: Becoming Oompa-Loompa 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null A short documentary that explains the process of how actor Deep Roy prepared to play the Oompa-Loompas in the 2005 film Charlie and the Chocolate Factory and shows how Deep was able to play all of them. Charlie and the Chocolate Factory: Becoming Oompa-Loompa
